content:
This PR removes another commutativity instance in docs#Ideal.quotientMap‚Çê

(It will be used in a forthcoming one to develop a variant AdjoinRoot.lift' of docs#AdjoinRoot.lift where the target is non necessarily commutative but the element x commutes with the image of the morphism i to be extended. That will allow to remove the commutativity assumption on S in docs#AdjoinRoot.liftHom .
If you prefer so, I can do both at once, but the present one should be very easy to merge.)
the title makes it sound to me like you're removing an instance instead of requirements from an instance!
But if it is already on the queue, then I wouldn't bother.
